meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynda Del Genis Lori Wright Umiko Post Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4063.

td.p: Lynda Del Genis, a technical writer from Baltimore, Maryland
Lori Wright, a benefits consultant from Atlanta, Georgia
Umiko Post, a stay-at-home mom from Peoria, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,800)

tr.td: GEOGRAPHIC "LAND"S
A FASHIONABLE CATEGORY
THE INVENTIVE FRENCH
COLLEGE FOOTBALL
OUT OF THIS WORLD
5-LETTER WORDS
